works.description:
An article originally published on Appolicious.com titled "The iPhone could be just one killer app away from beating Android" was republished without authorization by a website called Sananews.net. 

Sananews is indexed by Google News, and this article has been getting "above-the-fold" treatment for two days on Google News for terms including "iPhone apps" and Android apps"  

I am the Managing Editor of Appolicious.com, and noticed this article while searching Google News for information related to my publication's industry.
